name: Age of Anubis
description:
Age of Anubis is a rogue like dungeon crawler (Brought to you by Dungeon Crawlers). You play a character called Amon in the cruel pyramids of Egypt. Your goal is to defeat Anubis and free the villagers of the evil curse.

Throughout the game your platforming skills will be tested and your ability to kill and not be killed. If you die within the dungeon you will lose all your gold and current weapon, however, if you manager to find a door and escape you will reap the rewards for your efforts.

Continue to level up and get better weapons while exploring further into the randomly generated dungeon. Once you are strong enough you can have an epic face off with Anubis himself.
